channel.description: Recent content in Welcome back for Drinktober 2024! on Drinktober 2024

item.title: The new face of terror
item.description: Drinkowe’en week begins with the terrifying presence of Pineapple Head. Hopefully he’ll go away soon…

item.title: Forged by the hand of DOOM!
item.description: Only the mightiest of blades are worthy to be wielded by the hand of DOOM! And the very best of them are forged by DOOM’s own hand, here in the DOOM Forge!

item.title: He wants your chips
item.description: A royal presence today in the form of the mighty Seagull King!

item.title: Going old-school
item.description: Bit of a blast from the past today as we dig out the glowsticks and head back to the 90s as a Retro Raver

item.title: On a roll
item.description: We’re no strangers to pubs You know the rules, and so do I A pint of beer is what I’m thinking of You wouldn’t drink it with any other guy

item.title: In space, no one can drink your beer
item.description: Venturing into the depths of space today, I’m besieged by hostile Xenomorphs. Hopefully they’re just looking for a beer!

item.title: If it pours, we can drink it!
item.description: Welcome to the jungle! We’ve got guns and flames. And this beer, which will make you a Goddamn Sexual Tyrannosaurus. Just like me!

item.title: Hier kommt die bier
item.description: Bit of a Rammstein theme today, so obviously we needed fire. Lots of fire.

item.title: Don’t Panic!
item.description: 7 and a half million years. That’s how long we’ve been waiting for an answer to the ultimate question of Life, the Universe and Everything. Turns out it was beer all along!

item.title: Just glue some gears on it
item.description: Cogs and brass and all things steampunk today

item.title: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the pub
item.description: Today’s installment takes us to the coast for a fun day by the sea. But beware what lurks below the calm waters of Shark Bay!

item.title: We've got kegs! We know how to use 'em
item.description: “We’re just normal men.” “What do you mean, normal men?” “We’re just Sharp Dressed men!”

item.title: Beer is the mind killer
item.description: He who controls the beer controls the universe

item.title: What's going on?
item.description: I am Jonny, prince of Beerternia. Fabulous secret powers were revealed to me the day I held aloft my magic sword and said “Heeeeyaaaayaayayay Heeeyayaayayaaay! What’s going on?” I became Beerman : the most powerful man in the pub!

item.title: Beerman 3:16
item.description: As the King Of The Ring Pull, I’m serving notice to every one of the Drinktober beers. I don’t give a damn what they are, they’re all on the list, and that’s Stone Cold’s list, and I’m fixing to start drinking all of ’em!And that’s the bottom line, because Beerman said so.

item.title: How do, Ken?
item.description: There’s been a few complaints about me practising my fireball technique around the village. “That’s dangerous!” “Oh, my car!”, stuff like that. Seems like in this sleepy Yorkshire town there’s just no place for a Street Fighting man…

item.title: Toot!
item.description: Toot!

item.title: From Girders
item.description: The Unstoppable Iron Bloke returns once again with a brand new beverage. This time around he’s headed north of the border to sample the local Iron Brew.

item.title: Say my name
item.description: It’s the 7th of Drinktober and I’m Breaking Bad, with an appearance from Mr White.

item.title: Rats!
item.description: Keeping with the ninja turtle theme for the weekend, with an appearance from the world’s deadliest ninja rat : Master Splinter

item.title: Beero in a half shell
item.description: Cowabunga, dudes! It’s everyone’s favourite middle-aged mutant ninja tithead, with a delicious can of Donatello’s Italian Pils!

item.title: SHES BACK
item.description: A hearty welcome beer fans, I’m back! \ October has snuck up far too quickly once again and I am already missing a cheeky Savvy B. You might notice I am late to the sober party - in true Drinktober style I decided to jet off on a pre sobriety holiday and tit about in Croatia, I hope you all forgive me! \ Jonny is already having a whale of a time with his escapades so I’ve been debating how to make this year a bit harder.

item.title: I think I'm a clone now
item.description: I needed a little help with today’s instalment, but who could I trust to have my back? There’s only one man up to the job. That’s right - I’m teaming up with myself to tackle Cloudwater’s Double Impact. Double Beerman, Double Trouble.

item.title: Live and let drink
item.description: The name’s Man. Beer Man. Licensed to drink.

item.title: Fus Ro Drink
item.description: It’s the second of Drinktober and I’m travelling to far-off Skyrim to sample the local beer. The wildlife’s a bit on the fearsome side but I did enjoy a nice can of Nord, until I took an arrow to the knee.

item.title: Falco!
item.description: And we are back! Another 31 days of beer-themed nonsense awaits. Kicking things off in fine style we have everyone’s favourite musical camelid. Rock me, Llamadeus!

item.title: It's beginning to look a lot like Drinktober!
item.description: Well, here we are again. Tomorrow heralds the start of yet another season of booze and silliness as Drinktober returns for year number 8. Settle in - we have such sights to show you!
